backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor for managing user profiles and surgery cases with access control, case creation, retrieval, and update logic.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function converting old list‑based case storage into a map keyed by caseId.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Deployment guidance describing when and how to redeploy the frontend with fresh backend bindings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the frontend application via main.tsx.
frontend/redeploy.sh: Script performing deterministic full redeploy of the frontend, including rebuild and deployment steps.
Script that removes stale artifacts, reinstalls dependencies, regenerates backend bindings, and builds the frontend.
frontend/scripts/verify-live-backend-bin: Guide for verifying that the deployed frontend uses the correct and current backend canister bindings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component handling authentication, backend connection, profile setup, case management UI, and modal flows.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Empty placeholder file for a camera capture component.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays a surgery case card with patient info, task toggling, edit and delete actions, and date formatting. Handles mutation calls to update or delete a case with UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Provides a full form for creating or editing surgery cases with prefill logic, demographics extraction, validation, and task checklist handling. Manages form state, initialization, and save operations.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Renders and manages the searchable, sortable list of cases with loading, error, and empty-state handling. Filters and sorts cases before displaying CaseCard components.
Reusable date input with a text field and calendar popover, converting and validating date strings. Syncs internal state with external value changes.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Provides a paste-only textarea that extracts and returns demographic data from pasted text. Clears itself after processing extracted demographics.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Displays empty-state messaging and optional migration guidance depending on authentication and backend connectivity. Shows instructions for importing or migrating case data.
frontend/src/components/cases/ServerCase: Shows a descriptive error alert when server case loading fails and offers a retry button. Uses backend error classification to provide clearer messaging.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: UI controls for selecting sort field and toggling ascending/descending order. Updates parent-controlled sort settings through callbacks.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Renders a filtered list of required, incomplete tasks with optional color-coded borders and toggles task completion.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports all stored cases to a downloadable CSV file and shows toast notifications for success or errors.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: Provides a dialog to upload, parse, validate, and import cases from a CSV file with error handling and progress feedback.
frontend/src/components/errors/BackendCo: Displays a troubleshooting alert for backend connection failures with guidance and retry options.
frontend/src/components/errors/ModalErro: Error boundary for modal content that logs errors and shows a recovery UI allowing the modal to be closed.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the app footer with branding, current year, and a caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays the app header with branding and login/logout handling via Internet Identity, including environment badges.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Shows a recovery screen for startup connection issues with tailored messaging for token errors and retry/reload controls.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: UI bar showing online status, backend connection state, and sync controls with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on identity, recreating and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor with error detection and retry logic to surface initialization failures.
Combines identity, actor state, and backend probing to determine connection status and provide retry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Manages merged local and server case data, with mutations that persist to local storage and update queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Returns 'Draft' or 'Live' based on hostname heuristics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading and managing identity state and login lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via window events and navigator.onLine.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and surgery cases, including a paginated case fetcher and creation mutation with authorization handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Implements a sync routine that merges local and server surgery cases using pagination, resolves conflicts, normalizes data, and updates local storage and React Query state.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Defines local surgery case types with sync-related fields and form data structures based on backend case types.
Provides helpers to classify backend errors into categories with user-friendly messages, including actor initialization error handling.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Implements CSV export and parsing for surgery cases, including validation, task column handling, and robust line parsing.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Contains timezone-safe date-only utilities for validation and conversion, plus legacy date helpers for broader formatting and parsing.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsExtract.t: Parses pasted text with regex to extract patient demographics and returns a best‑effort structured object.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and checks a persisted Draft admin token from the URL or sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Loads, saves, and clears locally persisted surgery cases in localStorage with bigint handling and field normalization.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases while preserving local‑only fields and prepares pending changes for sync.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Finds the most recent case by MRN and derives prefill demographic fields from it.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and utilities to create, normalize, and filter task checklists for cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state and pending backend fixes related to safe loading and syncing of large surgery‑case datasets.
